mapper.sql: id, employee_id, project_id, forenoon, afternoon, hour, date, remark, date_insert, date_update
mapper.select: SELECT c.yr AS year,c.mm AS month,c.dd AS day,c.dt AS date,c.day_of_week AS dayOfWeek, IFNULL(t.forenoon,0) AS forenoon,IFNULL(t.afternoon,0) AS afternoon,IFNULL(t.hour,0) AS hour FROM calendar c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ad.date AS date,IFNULL(ad.forenoon,0) AS forenoon,IFNULL(ad.afternoon,0) AS afternoon,IFNULL(ad.hour,0) AS hour FROM attendance_day ad WHERE ad.employee_id = #{params.employeeId} AND ad.project_id = #{params.projectId} )t ON t.date = c.dt WHERE c.yr = #{params.year} AND c.mm = #{params.month} ORDER BY year
